#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,i,j,l,found;
	string a,b;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		found=0;
		cin>>a;
		cin>>b;
		l=0;
		for(i=0,j=0;i<a.length();i++)
		{
			if(a[i]==b[j])
			{
				l++;
				j++;
			}
		  if(j==b.length())
		  {
		  	found=1;
		  break;
	     }
		}
		if(found)
		printf("1\n");
		else
		printf("0\n");
	}
}
